title: Patrick McLoughlin – 2015 Statement on Aviation Security
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the statement made by Patrick McLoughlin, the Transport Secretary, in the House of Commons on 5 November 2015.
content:
[![Patrick McLoughlin](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/patrickmcloughlin.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/patrickmcloughlin.jpg)

With permission Mr Speaker I wish to make a statement on the recent decisions taken by the government following the loss of the Russian Metrojet flight on Saturday (31 October 2015).
